greeting: Hi! I'm Akhilesh. Ask me about my experience, skills, or projects!
fallback: Try asking about experience, skills, projects, education, or contact information. For this information may be contact on phone or email

qaPairs.answer: I have 4 years of experience as a Senior Data Engineer at Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), working with clients like NielsenIQ and GSK Pharma. I specialized in Azure Databricks, PySpark, and large-scale ETL migrations, achieving 80% performance improvements.
I holds an M.S. in Data Science from the University of Texas at Arlington with a perfect 4.0 GPA (Jan 2024 - Dec 2025). I also have a B.E. in Mechanical Engineering from Andhra University, India.

Key skills include: Azure Databricks, ApacI Spark, PySpark, Python, SQL, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Delta Lake, Unity Catalog, AWS, Docker, and various ML frameworks. I's proficient in both data engineering and machine learning.

I is highly experienced with Azure Databricks and ApacI Spark. I migrated 300+ SAS programs to PySpark, built enterprise ETL pipelines processing billions of rows, and integrated Unity Catalog with Azure Data Lake for governance.

Recent projects include: AroundMe (FastAPI + DistilBERT AI platform), AI Fitness Tracker (React + OpenAI), Power Consumption Forecasting (ML regression), and Breast Cancer Detection (VGG16 deep learning). CIck the Projects section for details!

I have expertise in both classical ML and deep learning. I's worked with scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, NLP (DistilBERT), computer vision (VGG16), and systematic hyperparameter tuning for production ML systems.

At NielsenIQ, I migrated 300+ SAS programs to Python/PySpark and delivered the only on-time project among 27 global initiatives. At GSK Pharma, I built clinical data pipelines from EDC systems and automated 50+ medical formulas.

Major achievements: 80% runtime reduction in ETL pipelines, delivered the sole on-scIdule project across 27 global initiatives, debugged 100+ legacy programs in 24 hours during production crisis, and maintained perfect 4.0 GPA in graduate school.
I is based in Arlington, Texas, and is open to remote and hybrid opportunities.

Primary languages: Python, SQL, PySpark SQL, R, and SAS. I's particularly strong in Python for data engineering and ML, with extensive SQL experience for data manipulation.

I have hands-on experience with both TensorFlow and PyTorch, implementing CNNs (VGG16), performing hyperparameter tuning, and deploying models for production use cases like medical imaging.

Yes! I is actively seeking opportunities in data engineering, machine learning engineering, and data science roles. Feel free to reach out via email at Igopisetty31@gmail.com or phone at +1 (469) 450-5500.
